document_data.mainbody:
orin Honedaxe was a revered dwarven mother and a protector of Myth Drannor who died long before the advent of the Weeping War.
Korin possessed a unique enchanted warhammer - the Sunderstone.
After her death, Korin Honedaxe was interred, along with her powerful magical weapon, within a dwarven tomb complex deep within the Elven Catacombs underneath Castle Cormanthor. The dead hero was still undisturbed as of 1369 DR, guarded by dwarven statues - iron golems, and protective magics of the tombs that allowed those on need to claim weapons of fallen heroes and unleashed incorporeal undead on grave robbers.
